CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "Nigerian Editor Visits - Alhaji Babatunde Jose, editor of the Daily Times in Nigeria, Africa, visited City Hall while in Pittsburgh. Councilman James A. Jordon escorted him on a tour of city departments, regional planning, redevelopment and ACTION - Housing offices.  He also met some of the city's political leaders, above.  Left to right: Assemblyman K. Leroy Irvis, Mr. Jose, Louis Mason Jr., executive director of the Pittsburgh Human Relations Commission; Councilman Jordon and Atty. Linn Washington, chairman of the 13th Ward. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Assemblyman K. Leroy Irvis, Nigerian editor Alhaji Babatunde Jose, Louis Mason Jr., Councilman James A. Jordon, and Atty. Linn Washington, standing in City Hall office
